content:
ServiceRemotingProviderAttribute ServiceRemotingProviderAttribute Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.dll

This is a base type for attribute that sets the default service remoting provider to use for remoting the service interfaces defined and used in the assembly.

Edit

In this Article

[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Assembly)]
public abstract class ServiceRemotingProviderAttribute : Attribute, _Attribute<AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Assembly)>

Remarks

On service side, implementation of this attribute is looked up by CreateServiceRemotingListener<TStatefulService>(TStatefulService, StatefulServiceContext) and CreateServiceRemotingListener<TStatelessService>(TStatelessService, StatelessServiceContext) methods on the runtime to create a default IServiceRemotingListener for the stateful and stateless services.

On client side, implementation of this attribute is looked up by ServiceProxyFactory constructor to create a default IServiceRemotingClientFactory when it is not specified.

Note that on client side Create<TServiceInterface>(Uri, ServicePartitionKey, TargetReplicaSelector, String) method create a default ServiceProxyFactory once and hence the provider lookup happens only for the first time, after which the same provider is used.

The order in which this attribute is looked up is as follows:

Creates a service remoting client factory that can be used by the ServiceProxyFactory to create a proxy for the remoted interface of the service.

An IServiceRemotingListener for the specified service.
